name: z80-asm-meter
description: Z80 Assembly clock cycles and bytecode size meter

z80-asm-meter.languageIds.description: Additional language IDs for which the extension is enabled (such as "c" for in-lined assembly)

z80-asm-meter.maxLines.description: Disables metering when the line count of the selection exceeds this value

z80-asm-meter.maxLoC.description: Stops metering when the lines of code (LoC) count exceeds this value

z80-asm-meter.timing.description: Controls the visibility of the timing information in the status bar
enumDescriptions: Z80+M1 timing information (MSX standard) is shown
Amstrad CPC timing information (in number of NOPs) is shown
Both Z80 and MSX (Z80+M1) timing information are shown
Both Z80 and Amstrad CPC timing information are shown

z80-asm-meter.size.description: Controls the visibility of the size information in the status bar
enumDescriptions: Processed lines of code (LOC) count is shown
Both bytecode size and LOC count are shown

z80-asm-meter.opcode.description: Controls the visibility of the instruction and its opcode in the status bar
enumDescriptions: Neither instruction nor its opcode are shown
The opcode of the instruction is shown
Both instruction and its opcode are shown

z80-asm-meter.maxOpcodes.description: Stops instruction and opcode block visualization (tooltip) when the instruction count exceeds this value
